title: A narcissist tells me I'm always lying and hiding something (even I don't and I'm trying to prove him wrong). Does he really believe in that, or is he aware that he is manipulating me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually it’s both, together and at the same time. Victims/survivors often make the incredible mistake to think “from their own mind” of perspective. (call projection, you project your qualities on the narcissist) Here is an example. A survivor could think: “If I would say such a thing, I would either be in complete denial of what I am doing and not aware of it “OR” totally 100% percent aware. Nobody could do both, because I can’t.” This is a ENOURMOUS OUTRAGEOUS mistake, because if you could think like a narcissist, YOU WOULD BE A NARCISSIST. In finding the truth, or getting familiar with the way narcissist really thinks you have to COMPLETELY ABANDON THE WAY “YOU” THINK and turn it of for a while and than start using your imagination and invent something new you are not familiar with and could not imagine ever existed. Using your imagination, you will be able to conceive their fucked up way of thinking. The reality is that the narcissist does both together. He/She indeed does really believe in the lies they spat out AND are aware they are manipulating you AND do it with malice. All those 3 things together. ALL together ALL at the same time, or with few seconds/minutes aparts. Narcissist's are very good at attacking you knowingly, and 60 seconds later, convincing themselves they where the victims and where defending themselves. Since 60 seconds is kind of short, I say they do both together.

NEVER justify or explain yourself to a narcissist….. why should you? You’ve done nothing wrong. It’s their paranoia and projection which has them believe you’re some negative person you’re not. No apology is needed from you for THEIR unwarranted projection techniques/tricks and paranoia. They’re trying to offload their own guilt/shame/confusion by these accusations as they don’t want to own them and work on sorting them out. You learn over time that often the accusations which come from a narcissist are a description of themselves and what they’re up to. That’s how they give themselves away. Rather than justify yourself or apologise to the narcissist reflect their behaviour back to them. It’s like a negative energy ball they’ve thrown at you. It’s not yours so throw it back to them. It starves them of supply, gives them nothing to hang on to and rag around. I did this once to someone and it left her speechless. I posted narc-articles on my facebook page. I’d blocked her but she has a fake profile that she uses in case people block her. She came on the phone in a very accusing manner after ‘WILL YOU STOP POSTING WHAT YOUR’E POSTING, BECAUSE I KNOW THAT’S ABOUT ME. I KNOW what you’re up to behind the scenes…. you’re plotting and planning behind my back’. I just responded ‘No Amanda, they’re your tactics you’ve just described, don’t offload on to me what’s not mine, you need to own it.’. She’s not called since. LOL I knew I wasn’t plotting and planning behind the scenes that’s not how I operate, I’m above board……. so what was she talking about? I was only too happy to have escaped her nonsense, but I did find a lot of justification and stress relief in posting the narc articles on my page. Everyone needs an outlet. Two wrongs don’t make a right but she brought it on herself as she shouldn’t have been snooping on my facebook page when I’d blocked her. It had the desired effect regardless.

Hi. I think they convince themselves into believing their own lies. So even if it started out as a game to them, it becomes their reality eventually. Hence how they can become so powerful over you. This way their manipulation appears to be pure and heartfelt when in reality its all a load of crap. If you do not fall into their trap, then the lie disassembles and the truth comes out eventually exposing the actual game they were wanting to play with you. If it were the truth to begin with then their would be explanations behind it showing reason. Thats why when the narc manipulates you and you ask them for explanations, they can't give you any because it was never the truth to begin with. This generalizarion helped me figure out when I was being manipulated. Which was constantly.

They’re projecting they’re feelings on to you, whatever a narcissist is accusing you of is guaranteed to be what they’re actually doing themselves. I lived with one for a long time and they literally make you feel like you’re going crazy, no relationship with a narcissist will ever work, you’ll either end up being discarded and they’ll move onto their next supply or if you leave them first they will turn your world upside down, I left nearly a year ago and have been stalked and harassed ever since as well as having my name smeared and false allegations to the police (police proved him to be a liar) I’ve had to get a restraining order now, still doesn’t stop him trying to hoover me though. They’re horrible individuals with absolutely no empathy or conscience.

Absolutely manipulating you. Remember that narcissist’s love having stuff to blackmail you with or hold over you. It could be projection, but… even if it isn’t, it could be an attempt to get you dump more details. As we were divorcing, my ex suddenly started babbling every manipulation secret she’d ever held from me. One trick was “make a false accusation and let the other person defend themselves, it’s a great way to get people to open up”. (And give her details to gossip about or use as leverage.) Or he could just be poking at you to see if he can get a negative emotional response because he’s looking for amusement. Example. My ex spent much of the last few years together accusing me of being angry every morning over and over again. She would repeat the accusation until I’d finally lose my cool. She would then say “see, I told you that you were angry”. Our marriage ended three months after I stopped losing my cool. That’s all I can think of. But don’t defend yourself to a fool with low emotional intelligence. There are better uses of your energy. Don’t feed him, feed you.

It sounds like he is likely both projecting and blame-shifting, … which, if correct, likely means that you need to pay close attention to his own behavior. Narcissists are famous for shifting the blame onto others for their own sins/misdeeds. It’s yet another game he plays, in order to keep you anxious, and busily working to convince him you are not cheating - so as to win back his approval; while, allowing himself to buy time, … to continue cheating, … with you looking the other way. He is fully aware of his shenanigan. When you figure out what he is likely up to, you will probably be upset with yourself for not having caught on sooner. Don’t be … we’ve all been here. Wishing you well !!!

A narcissist will always think they’re right. Even when proven wrong and then they see it they’re possibly wrong, they will pivot into a direction that steers them to be right. They’re masters at it because they’ve had their whole life to practice it. Gaslighting and mental gymnastics and the word salad is enough to drive you to near insanity if you try to follow along. And in that they know what they’re doing, and they don’t care. So in your specific situation, he’s testing your boundaries so that he can begin controlling you because he’s caused you to doubt your own intuition. Now that he has, he can then start cheating, stealing, or anything that your particular N does. So yes, he believes it. Even when he doesn’t, he’ll scheme up more devices to reinforce his insecurities and lies. It’s their defense mechanism.

He's projecting what he is luvvie onto you he's got a guilty conscience there please be careful becayse if you throw ot back to him what's he hiding he could go into violence at being found out please can I say and I know it's not easy try to get yourself out of this relationship soon as I wasted over 20 years and it's my biggest regret and mistake of my life I wish I never ever had a thing to do with him and I've never been happier than as I am single it's better to be alone than lonely!

So how do you like the game so far? Like a game you can never win. Notice how the rules change EVERYTIME and ALL the time? He knows exactly what he is doing and actually he is telling on himself. He is lying and hiding. It is projection of his actions onto you. Oh and it is the hint of the smear campaign too, what he is telling everyone else about you. SO stop defending yourself and just leave the game. Sometimes you do not have to “WIN” to “WIN”.

Hes gaslighting and manipulating you 100%. I used to get that bullshit from ms. Borderline ALL the fucking time…You know one of the big reasons they say that? Because THEY are doing exactly what they're accusing YOU of. Its also a part of their abandonment issues. They always have something to fucking hide so this shit with them goes on for the entire relationship. It seems to start within months, intermittent throughout love bomb and devalue…HEAVY HEAVY in discard. Yep, its one of the narc or bpd favorite games to play. It never ends.

First, this is projection. A very common tactic with people with NPD. But do not doubt for one second he isn't fully aware of what he is doing…some will disagree with me. They know what they are doing is wrong. It will not stop them. No. It will never change. Yes. They will continue to repeat this pattern. No. They will never feel remorse for all they have done. We need to be the ones to try and find a way…somehow to end this dark and maddening insanity once and for all.

Hello. That depends on why he started saying this to you to begin with. Did you accuse him first? If that is the case I would say he is trying to shift the focus away from himself and onto you by accusing you of something he is probably doing. If you did not accuse him first he may actually believe this. It is common for us to be paranoid and untrusting of others and all it takes is an off putting feeling one day for no apparent reason to send us down this path of sabotage in the relationship. Thanks for A2A

This type of person would accuse you of doing this because they are guilty of it as well. When a person is prone to gaslighting people then they will be also manipulating themselves. This person is angry that you are arguing with them about what they know and believe to be true about you. When you are doing this then you are the one that should have kept your mouth shut. You are not allowed to talk unless you are spoken to and you had better have something that this person wants to hear and this will range from how it is your fault and you made them do this to you. This type of person will not have any of your shit. You are to do as you are told and sit.

He is using this as a form of control,however, he may also partially believe it. At his core is a terribly insecure, self loathing individual who truly believes you cannot love him and is terrified of being abandoned by you. He is controlling yoi but begging for reassurance at the same time. This is not to say “pity and love him and it will all be better.” Unfortunately it probably wont. If he is an actual narcissist (exhibiting multiple traits) he will keep you in a world of emotional turmoil and conflict until you leave.

He is manipulating you. You are his scapegoat. What the narc does is accuse you of the very things he is doing. He is very aware he is manipulating you. He will not admit it. Ever. Don’t try to defend yourself or try to prove you are innocent. You are wasting your breath and your time. I would dump him immediately and go no contact. It’s exhausting and unhealthy for you. I briefly dated someone like that. He always accused me of cheating, which I didn’t do. He is the one who was constantly cheating. Best of luck.

They are projecting and gaslighting, it's one if their favorite games, They know they are manipulating you, its purposeful and cruel, it's actually one of the most damaging forms of abuse. It will cause you to always be on the defensive, walk on egg shells, make sure they always know everything you are doing and where you are at. Its absolute control, if you let it continue and if you let them remain in a position to affect you that way. It's dangerous and abusive consider your options.

Hi Malvina, Whatever a narcissist accuses you of are the things that THEY are doing! So it gives you a heads-up, he is lying and hiding something. And of course, he knows this, so your trying to prove him wrong is getting him attention and energy from you. Narcissists project their behaviours and faults onto other people. It gives them a sense of relief from it. But they will never acknowledge it, their fragile ego and sense of self won’t allow them to take responsibility for anything or admit any fault. I hope that this helps you, Clare x

This is just nonsense, typical narc manipulation. He knows you are not lying or hiding anything. It is part of the process. Please read about narcissism, because this is the least of what you can expect- there will also be infidelity and cruelty and lies- guaranteed, also part of the process. Please see my earlier answers if you want elaboration or a book recommendation- it will be worthwhile checking this outb¡, because it will tell you what your future is going to hold. Good luck to you.

The narcissist doesn’t believe a word of what they are accusing you of. They know it isn’t true. They could be hiding and justifying their own behavior. The narcissist is punishing you for something. It could be as simple as you not paying enough attention to them and they feel threatened. And since you are aware that you are being manipulated why are you putting up with a narcissist? I would be at a fast run out of there.

Who knows? The facts are of no concern to them; establishing and maintaining control is their main aim. I wouldn't want to be around such a person as they sound potentially dangerous. The men who end up harming or killing their partner are often the type to be convinced they're having an affair etc. I'd advise you to try and cut contact/remove yourself from their sphere of influence. He sounds like a dangerous one if he's insisting on a fake reality.

They say they are usually guilty of what they are accusing you of. Stop wasting your time trying to prove him wrong. He knows what he’s doing. Instead take that energy and prove what he’s doing. At least if that’s what you need to really end it anyway.

In the moment he may actually believe it. That’s why he sounds so convincing, because he is actually feeling the emotions he displays. Subconsciously though he knows he is manipulating you. And at times he’ll realize it consciously and laugh at his cleverness, or quickly bury the true motivation before it could affect him.

Sounds like you're being gaslighted. Don't allow the manipulation to make you prisoner of the accusations against you, you know exactly what you're doing and not doing. So why would you argue with someone that's trying to convince you that you're doing something that you're not you need to spend your energy on someone who's going to validate? Not manipulate you.

It is most likely that he is lying to you, and hiding something from you. Most people, not just narcs, tend to project guilt onto the person who they are hurting, because that way, they can justify betraying you.

Narcs can never be believed. They're master manipulators and can do no wrong. He surely knows what he's doing to make you feel guilty. If you didn't do it, you have nothing to apologize for and you don't owe him an explanation other than to say that he’s full of shit. Being with a narc is hellish and you should dump him and find someone with integrity.

He’s manipulating you to think that you have to answer to him, always be aware that he’s watching so you are on edge and comply with his means to manipulate you and control you. He has no reason to doubt your trust, don’t allow him to control your life or tell you that you are something you are not. He’s playing mind games.
He's busily having an affair. They're not very inventive creatures. They blame you for exactly the things theyre doing. They find this hilarious.

Narcissists project what they are doing into you. He is lying and hiding so he tells you that you are so to deflect the responsibility from himself. A narcissist is unable to be truthful, most especially about themselves. A wonderful informational site is flyingmonkeysdenied.com

He is manipulating you on purpose. He is fully aware of what he is doing. He wants you to second guess yourself, he wants you to be fully confused, he wants you to be afraid of him. It’s all a mind game. Don’t fall for it.

You seem to be enjoying it, or you would have said goodbye along time ago. You call them a narcissist, but you keep going back for more. Cut this person out of your life, you don’t need to prove anything.
Gaslighting you. It is not you. He is making you please him more- stop. Do you know what projecting us? Someone blaming others for things to hide their own actions …
From what people say on this forum, I would guess he is reflecting his own behavior on you. It will only get worse. Get away from him!
A narcissist often accuses you of what they themselves are doing. It’s called projection. Who knows why? Maybe they feel shifting their guilt onto you lessens their guilt.
